onBoard1Text: SelfLocker is an application that keeps you up to date with information about where your orders are!
onBoard2Text: Receive orders from the store at any time without contacting the staff!
onBoard3Text: Thanks to the application, you can open a terminal for issuing parcels directly from your phone.
onBoard4Text: Stay updated! The application will send notifications about the finished order and the possibility of collection.
termsWarningText: To use the SelfLocker app, you must accept the regulations.
login1Text: Enter your phone number and enjoy the full functionality of the application.
login2Text: You got a text message with a verification code. Please enter it below.
login3Text: Welcome to SelfLocker - receive parcels even more conveniently!
boxStatusReady:
Jesteś ju przy skrytce,
a Twoja przesyłka czeka
na Ciebie tu obok!
boxStatusOpened:
Twoja przesyłka czeka na Ciebie tu obok!
Podpowiem Ci, kieruj się w XXXXX
 od ekranu, według współrzędnych:
boxStatusDoorsStillOpen: Czyżby drzwiczki skrytki nadal pozostały otwarte?
state_mixed: multiple parcels inside have different states
